projects.name: Moblie Weather App
projects.description: Developed a mobile weather app that displays the weather and a background picture based on the weather. The app uses the devices GPS reciever to get the co-ordinates and send it to an API. The data from this API is used to show the weather and is also used to make another API call to get a picture based on the weather at that location.

projects.name: Checklist App
projects.description: Developed a checklist app that allows users to make a list of items. Firebase functionality will be added soon.

projects.name: Eccomerce App
projects.description: Developed an ecommerce app using state management and firebase. The app allows users to add items to their cart and view their cart.

projects.name: Todo App
projects.description: Developed a simple full stack todo app using React, NodeJs and MongoDB. The app allows users to add items to their todo list and view their todo list.
